column5: This is the first time I've reached out for help I've looked on line and thought of taking pills,  I thought my life was complete got a great partner after years of suffering in silence over a traumatic up bringing and different abusive relationships I have tried pills, and recently tried cutting my wrists only done one as someone walked In....  Now I feel like I can't go out I've been signed off work a d feel like everyone is watching me or judging me,  I lay there at night thinking of ways to do it again or even find myself in the kitchen looking for a knife I know this don't make sense I'm a man and should be able to deal with my emotions
